import React from 'react'; import BottomBar from '../components/navbar/BottomBar'; import img from '../assets/images/bag6.jpg'; const LandingPage = () => { return (

Welcome to Fatafat Yatra

Experience the best bus booking platform with Fatafat Yatra. Discover the top reasons to choose us:

  • Lightning-Fast Booking

    Book your bus tickets in a matter of seconds with our user-friendly interface.

  • Extensive Route Coverage

    Explore a vast network of bus routes, connecting all major cities across the country.

  • Unbeatable Prices

    Get the best deals and discounts on your bus tickets with Fatafat Yatra.

); }; export default LandingPage;
